attributes.action: Reverse the scrapping of Britannia on the new coinage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The decision has been taken to scrap the image of Britannia on coins ,this will be the first time in 300 plus years that this national symbol has been left off British Coinage.This is an integral symbol of our nation and this  should never have been even considered.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
